definition: A female relative who is the daughter of one's sibling or half-sibling, typically used to refer to a niece.

examples.german: Die Nichte meines Bruders ist meine Cousine.
examples.english: My brother's daughter is my niece.
My niece has her birthday today.

examples.german: Die Nichte meiner Schwester ist meine Nichte zweiten Grades.
examples.english: My sister's daughter is my second cousin.
My niece enjoys playing the piano.
